content.question: Images in lines 15-32 (“Say what . . . there”) represent the lover through the motif of

choices.label: an adventurer who searches constantly for new places
an observer who will not join the activities of a community
a tourist who is incapable of connecting with local residents
a traveler who cannot reach a desired destination

content.answer: a traveler who cannot reach a desired destination

skill.text: Skill 5.D: Identify and explain the function of an image or imagery.
